item.title: Introduction
item.description: A Go toolkit to build reactive web interfaces. Why does it exist ? # Wants to provide a way to build moderately complex reactive apps for folks who are comfortable with Go. The library is a result of a series of experiments to build reactive apps in Go: gomodest-template. It works by patching the DOM on user events using morphdom. What is it ? # A Go library Focuses only on the view layer.
